1: <pb/><e>B'ich re li taqsink.</e> <pb/><t>Nintaqsi li wilob'aal sa' xb'eeneb' li tzuul:</t> <t>b'ar taachalq chaq lintenq'ankil?</t>
2: <t>Lintenq'ankil nachalk rik'in li Qaawa',</t> <t>a'an laj winqob'resihom re choxach'och'.<f>[328]</f></t>
3: <pb/><t>Ink'a' tatxkanab' chi t'ane'k sa' b'e,</t> <t>xb'aan naq ink'a' nawark laj K'aak'alehom aawe.</t>
4: <t>Ink'a' nawark chi moko namortaak li ru laj K'aak'alehom re laj Israel.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Li Qaawa' a'an na'ilok ut namuheelank aawe;</t> <t>li Qaawa' wank chak'atq.</t>
6: <t>Maak'a' tixb'aanu aawe li saq'e chi kutan,</t> <t>chi moko li po chiru li q'oqyink.</t>
7: <pb/><t>Li Qaawa' nakatxkol chiru chixjunil li rahilal;</t> <t>a'an nakolok re laayu'am.</t>
8: <t>Li Qaawa' na'ilok aawe jo'q'e tat-elq ut jo'q'e tatsutq'iiq chaq,</t> <t>chalen anaqwan ut junelik q'e kutan.</t>
